product_meta.title: Julep No Excuses Invisible Facial Sunscreen Gel Broad Spectrum SPF 40 With Vitamin E, 1 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
A completely transparent, fast-absorbing face sunscreen in an essence-gel base that delivers broad spectrum SPF 40 protection from UVA/UVB rays.

Goes on smoothly and dries quickly to a satin finish, making it perfect to wear under makeup. 

Benefits: macro-emulsion technology encapsulates SPF actives into a vitamin-enriched essence-gel base which preserves the efficacy of all ingredients until the time of application. 

• Rosehip seed oil delivers essential nutrients to soothe and repair, and acts as an antioxidant to protect and decrease environmental damage.
• Melon extract smooths, softens, and brightens skin.
• Camellia seed oil hydrates and clarifies skin.
• Oxalis triangularis extract (Jeju Island love plant), protects skin from environmental damage with rich antioxidants.
• Vitamin e protects against dehydration and free radical damage.
• Sunflower seed oil helps heal and retain moisture while providing an emollient texture that leaves skin soft. Sourced directly from Korea's Jeju Island.

To use: Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. Use a water-resistant sunscreen if swimming or sweating. Reapply at least every two hours.

BRAND STORY
At Julep, we celebrate Brave Pretty. Try any trend – no judgments, no fear. Our award-winning products hold our "Girlfriend's Promise": simplified, good for you, and no makeup artist required. There's no wrong way, just YOUR way.
feature_bullets: Protect your skin with our No Excuses Face Sunscreen, a lightweight facial essence gel sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 40. Completely transparent for everyday wear!
This transparent, lightweight, and non-sticky formula makes it perfect to wear under makeup!
Formulated with age defying ingredients sourced from Jeju Island, Korea.
This quick-absorbing gel protects your skin against harsh UVA/UVB rays.
Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply at least every two hours.
